data.message: I've been trying to find a way to contact and get help from someone on facebook about an issue I am having and I'm not having any luck in the help forum or getting my question answered and have not heard anything back after reporting the issue. Is there a way someone from facebook could please contact me?

replies.message: Hi Kathi! If you've reported something for not following the Facebook Terms, you may have the option to check the status of your report from the Support Dashboard. For more information, please check our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1uYQjDE -Elissa
Facebook is just awful.  Arrogant times 100.  Amazing.  I haven't heard after leaving messages.
I didn't report anything, I have friends not being able to see pictures I post to group pages.

It's very frustrating that I'm having and issue here with people not being able to see what I post and I can't see to find help no matter how many times I have reported this issue to facebook. People I'm not friends with can see these pictures, but my friends cannot? This makes no sense and this has been happening for a week or more now. Please help me here.
Knock knock, anybody there? seriously, I'm really frustrated here.

Kathi Hillner -- I was just entertaining myself during lunch and saw this.  I had the same problem.  I'd share a pic to a group page that was on my timeline, and the people in the group couldn't see it.  It turns out it's a permissions thing. T he best thing to do is re-upload onto the group page, not share to the group page.  This happens if you have friends in the group that are not your friends on FB (other than through that group).
